textBeforeTable: When we announce our next MMORPG it’s not going to be another WoW - we’re not a company that tends to tread the same ground. It’ll be something innovative and new that really brings entertainment to another level. Kotaku). The final answer offers the obvious point that with over 8 million WoW subscribers, they are not looking to create the same game again in a remark that does indicate plans to further explore the MMORPG market in the future: Empire offers an interview with Blizzard's Itzik Ben Bassat on the topic of World of Warcraft (thanks [Jan 23, 2007, 11:31 am ET] - Share - Viewing Comments On Blizzard's Next MMORPG --> Blue's News Favorite!
